author: pburba
msg: Fix encoding bug in CL commit info message.
* subversion/svn/util.c
Include svn_ebcdic.h
(svn_cl__print_commit_info): Use SVN_CMDLINE_PRINTF2 so utf-8 var args
are handled properly.

author: malcolm
msg: Trivial correctness fix.  Per the docstring for the
svn_wc_diff_callbacks2_t.dir_props_changed() callback, we should be
passing an access baton to the callback if one is available.  This is
the case whenever we report a local directory property modification,
so do so rather than always passing NULL.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/diff.c
(directory_elements_diff): Pass the access baton for the directory in
question to the dir_props_changed() callback.

author: pmarek
msg: Change the "live" properties only if they have really changed.
Without this change 1.3.0 believes that all files have property
changes and so sends all properties to the repository.
* subversion/libsvn_client/commit_util.c
(harvest_committables): Change the "live" properties only
if they have really changed.

author: rooneg
msg: Reset svn:date before finalizing commits in fsfs so we can be sure that
the svn:date revprops remain ordered.
Review by: sussman
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(commit_body): Reset the svn:date revprop before moving the revprops
file into place when committing a revision.

author: rooneg
msg: Fix a typo in the svnserve.8 man page.
Patch by: Anton Hadinger <Anton.Hadinger@fh-landshut.de>
* subversion/svnserve/svnserve.8: turn off bold correctly at the end of
a filename.
